Question: This person was born before 31 October 1451 in Genoa, part of modern Italy.
Hints: Once in Cadiz, a grieving this person wrote to a friend at court:.
This person was received by the native cacique Guacanagari, who gave him permission to leave some of his men behind.
Some modern historians have argued that this person was not from Genoa, but instead, from Catalonia, Portugal, or Spain.
